tool_description: Analyzes the frequency and distribution of keywords throughout resume content to ensure optimal density for ATS systems while avoiding keyword stuffing.

target_keywords.description: List of keywords to analyze for density

optimal_density_range.description: Desired keyword density range as [min_percentage, max_percentage]

include_synonyms.description: Whether to include synonym variations in density calculation

error_messages: Empty resume text: Provide resume content for keyword density analysis.
No target keywords: Include at least one keyword to analyze.
Invalid density range: Provide exactly two numbers [min, max] where min < max and both are between 0.5 and 10.
Too many keywords: Limit analysis to 30 keywords for manageable results.
Keywords list format error: Ensure keywords array contains only string values.
usage: Provide resume text and target keywords, optionally specify optimal density range and synonym inclusion. The tool analyzes keyword frequency and distribution patterns.

overall_density.description: Overall keyword density percentage across entire resume

keyword_frequencies.description: Frequency count for each target keyword

density_status.description: Density assessment: under_optimized, optimal, over_optimized, keyword_stuffing

section_distribution.description: How keywords are distributed across resume sections

optimization_recommendations.description: Specific recommendations to achieve optimal keyword density

underused_keywords.description: Keywords that appear less frequently than optimal

overused_keywords.description: Keywords that may be used too frequently
